TTSC.SAPI5Settingshint: Configuration for using SAPI5 text-to-speech engine with Boyomi-chan
TTSC.BymChnDefaultVolumehint: Default value for individual vocalizer setting (min 0, max 300)
TTSC.CoeFontFunctionActivatehint: After saving changes, settings are added under here
TTSC.CoeFontVoiceListSettings: Register the CoeFont voice to be used
TTSC.CoeFontVoiceListSettingshint: Register the name and the uuid of each voice in CoeFont
TTSC.CoeFontMasterVolumeSetting: Volume setting for CoeFont sound sources(wav)
TTSC.CoeFontMasterVolumeSettinghint: Volume setting for sound source of wav files passed from CoeFont
TTSC.CoeFontAPIConnectorURL: URL of your own API to connect to the CoeFont API
TTSC.CoeFontAPIConnectorURLhint: Note: Not the URL of CoeFont API
TTSC.ButtonTTSSpeakerSettings: Individual readout settings for each vocalizer
TTSC.WindowSAPI5Settingstitle: Configuration of SAPI5 sound source to be used
TTSC.WindowID: ID in Boyomi-chan's text-to-speech engine (10001 or higher)
TTSC.WindowCheckDeletecontent: Are you sure you want to delete the file? (The deletion is immediate and cannot be restored.)
TTSC.WindowNoNameNoIdcontent: There is an item with a blank name or ID. Are you sure you want to delete the item?
TTSC.WindowCoeFontSettingstitle: Configuration of CoeFont sound source to be used
TTSC.WindowCoeFontSettingsUuid: Individual uuid displayed in the url on the CoeFont details page
TTSC.WindowCoeFontSettingsUuidtitle: Only single-byte alphanumeric characters and "._%+-" synbols. Please enter at least 30 characters
TTSC.WindowNoNamecontent: There is an item with a blank name. Are you sure you want to delete the item?
TTSC.WindowSelectSpeakerVoicetitle: Individual readout settings for each vocalizer
TTSC.ErrorCoeFontUuidMiss: The CoeFont uuid is blank. Please review the setting
TTSC.ErrorEmotionNone: The CoeFont emotion uuid is blank. Reset to default
